item.title: The 90% Seek Mystery: Debugging Apple TV on Budget Android Hardware
item.description: Iâ€™ve been dealing with a bizarre bug on my Acer Android TV. Every time I try to watch something on the Apple TV app, I hit a wall. I select a title, the spinner goes for about 45 seconds to a minute, and then: “This content could not be played.”
